nodes.text: ⁦@CatsCommentary⁩ weighs in on DA recall effort: “Boudin’s opponents are using the same tactics that conservative media harnessed to thwart the movement for Black lives: fear mongering, misinformation, and doomsday predictions.”\n https://t.co/LtlVP3jFDB
@DeanPreston @CatsCommentary Do you  have any argument other than smearing your opponents as racist, Dean? FYI not sure you noticed but you are white and so is failed DA @chesaboudin

@delk The campaign to recall @chesaboudin a year into his term with not even an allegation of misconduct is a gross, racist campaign that deserves to be condemned. I don’t plan to sugarcoat that. I will continue to work for real solutions.

@DeanPreston @delk @chesaboudin You liars really will try to smear just about anyone as racist, won't you? Funny how it's a white liar using that term to smear hardworking people who are being assaulted and killed as a result of the failures of another white guy, isn't it?
